title: While My Step Sister Sleeps
description: “Her t**s bounced and jolted with every collision, and her straggly, smudged head jerked around like a vandalized puppet...”This 6000+ word eBook contains rape fantasy, brutal sleep sex, dubious consent, anal sex, foot fetish, cream pie, pantie sniffing and revenge themes.She came into his life like a swirl of forbidden scent; the foxy little sister he never had, with her tail in the air and a fetish for simulated rape. One night after watching her mean boyfriend dutifully using her unconscious body, his curiosity about the true nature of their relationship proves too hard to resist...Caprini take his unique quality standard to the field of taboo erotica, bringing together unsurpassed originality and shamelessly filthy content, finished off with the standard precision edit.All characters featured in this story are at least 18 years old and are not blood related.
author: John Caprini
